Title: The Bridge
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick, Eddie Guzelian (executive story editor), Vivian Tse (executive story editor), Geraldine Inoa (staff writer)
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: The communities join forces to restore a bridge that will facilitate communication and trade; someone is gravely injured at the construction site.
